marklogic.body: I hope Current reads this. AND I still believe that Gore won and would have been the best Presidentual Choice. However Obermann is the lead dog in National Political News. I Like Spitzer, but he ain't Shultz, I Like Shultz but He ain't Obermann. Maybe if you want the best you have to put up with a little crap. If Obermann shows up on another netwark everyone else loses, on that time slot, including if he shows up on the internet. If the arguement is that he wouldn't cover the Republican Primaries, the only reason to cover them is to see what idiocy the audience came up with from booing a vet to Cheering the death penelity. Oberman hit the high Spots and when on with the s--- that the Repugs were pulling behind the scenes. The only failing of Obermann's was not enough coverage of Wisconsin and Walker. Other then that, he's the top dog. Hire him back before someone else does.
